name: Finalize and distribute Q3 Sales Report
description: Compile sales data from Shopify and Google Analytics to create the final Q3 performance report for stakeholders.

name: Upload 'Summer Clearance' collection photos
description: Upload all edited product photography for the Summer Clearance items. Ensure all SKUs are tagged correctly in the CMS.

name: Create social media assets for Holiday campaign
description: Design and get approval for 5 Instagram posts, 3 TikTok videos, and 2 Facebook banners for the upcoming Holiday Kickoff campaign.

name: Write SEO descriptions for 'Autumn Arrivals'
description: Write SEO-optimized product descriptions for the 15 new SKUs in the 'Autumn Arrivals' collection. Target keywords: 'cozy sweater', 'fall fashion'.

name: Restock inventory for best-selling hoodies
description: Coordinate with the warehouse to receive and process the new shipment of best-selling hoodies (SKUs: H-001, H-004, H-005). Update stock levels on the website.

name: Fix Bug: 'Sort by Price' filter not working
description: Users have reported that the 'Sort by Price: High to Low' product filter on collection pages is not functioning correctly. Needs urgent investigation.

name: Plan email campaign for January Clearance
description: Outline the email marketing strategy for the post-holiday clearance sale. Includes segmentation, subject lines, and promotional offers.

name: Investigate delayed shipments to California
description: Multiple customers from California have reported shipping delays. Coordinate with our logistics partner to identify the root cause.
